hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Dharr:That the Prophet commanded a man to fast on the thirteenth, fourteenth and fifteenth

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى مُوسَى بْنِ طَلْحَةَ فِي الْخَبَرِ فِي صِيَامِ ثَلاَثَةِ أَيَّامٍ مِنَ الشَّهْرِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Differences Reported From Musa Bin Talhah In The Narration About Fasting three days of each month
